keyword: how many calories in krispy kreme donuts
title: How Many Calories in Krispy Kreme Donuts?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in Krispy Kreme donuts, including macros, sodium, and variations for popular flavors like Original Glazed.
h1: How Many Calories in Krispy Kreme Donuts?
assumptions: Original Glazed variety, standard size (~52 g), fresh from the store, no additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, size, freshness, and customizations; check Krispy Kreme's official site or packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One Krispy Kreme Original Glazed Donut contains about 190 calories and 2 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Chocolate Iced Cream Filled (vs. Original Glazed)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Krispy Kreme Original Glazed donut?
What are the carbs in Krispy Kreme donuts?
faqs.a: One Original Glazed has 22 g carbs, mostly from sugars (10 g).

faqs.q: How much fat is in a Krispy Kreme donut?
faqs.a: 11 g total fat, including 5 g saturated fat per Original Glazed.

faqs.q: Do Krispy Kreme donuts have cholesterol?
faqs.a: Original Glazed has 0 mg cholesterol, but filled varieties may vary.

faqs.q: Calories in different Krispy Kreme donut flavors?
faqs.a: Ranges from 190 kcal (Original) to 400+ kcal for specialty filled or iced options.
